recipe.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipe.description: Comforting classic soup with tender chicken and egg noodles

steps.descr: Bring stock to boil, add chicken and cook for 20 minutes
steps.instructions: Bring stock to boil, add chicken and cook for 20 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's bring the stock to a boil and add the chicken. We'll let it cook for twenty minutes. You'll know it's ready when the chicken is tender and cooked through.
Let's carefully remove the chicken from the pot. Once it's cool enough to handle, shred it into lovely bite-sized pieces.

steps.descr: Add vegetables to stock, simmer for 10 minutes
steps.instructions: Add vegetables to stock, simmer for 10 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's add those lovely vegetables to the stock and let them simmer for ten minutes. You'll smell the wonderful aroma as they soften and release their flavors.

steps.descr: Add noodles and cook until tender
steps.instructions: Add noodles and cook until tender

on_enter.say: Let's add the noodles now and cook them until they're perfectly tender. Keep an eye on them so they don't overcook.
Time to return the shredded chicken to the pot. This will warm it through and let all those flavors mingle beautifully.

steps.descr: Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley
steps.instructions: Season with salt, pepper, and fresh parsley

on_enter.say: Let's finish off by seasoning the soup with a bit of salt, pepper, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley. Give it a taste and adjust as needed.
Brilliant! It's time to serve up this comforting chicken noodle soup. Enjoy it hot with some crusty bread on the side. Lovely!

notes.text:
Use homemade stock for best results
Don't overcook the noodles
Add lemon juice for brightness
